name: FNF - Vs. Xe Full Week
description: In this chapter, Xe is made to watch from afar her twin fight alone against the titan of a hero, Apex. Hopes are low for her, bad memories are resurfacing, and she’s not sure how much longer she can keep it together at this point. She wants a distraction from it all, and luckily you’re around to offer your help with what you do best. But is a distraction what she really needs? Maybe she just needs… someone to talk to.
